content.rendered:
Land of the ‘tree factory’ has a surface of 700 hectares and is located on the ‘Rio Paraguay’: the river that separates Paraguay and Brazil. 🌍

The river comes in handy when watering trees on the plantation. The river also serves as a transport channel for the supply of materials and the transport of nuts, oil and protein feed. 🌰🛢
